title: When All Else Fails....Create A New Credit File (Volume 1)
features: This is a step by step guide to help readers understand how to legally create an alternative credit profile utilizing the same secret techniques that celebrities, politicians, government workers and other high profile public figures have been using for decades in order to protect their privacy and safeguard their social security numbers. Utilizing the techniques shared in this guide the reader will be given a step by step process to legally build a new credit file regardless of their current credit history.
description: An accomplished, digitally-savvy, marketing, event planner and talent relations professional with deep media and entertainment relationships, strong strategic planning and organizational skills, broad retail and consumer promotions experience and the ability to provide innovative, enthusiastic and forward-thinking leadership in a team environment. Kevyn has made a life-long commitment to building and maintaining a successful brand . By leading the way in quality service, dependability and creative innovations in both the entertainment and general business arena Kevyn strives continuously to reach a high level of success on every project and business endeavor that he undertakes. After recognizing the strength of building strong associations in both the entertainment and general business arena Kevyn strategically positioned himself to gain valuable experience and exposure at the offices of Motown, MCA, and Solar Records where he gained vaulable knowledge and experience. In addition to being an acoomplished artist manager, business consultant, and concert promoter Kevyn has also been a guest panelist at The Learning Annex Real Estate Wealth Expo, BRE Conference, Impact Convention, Mid-Atlantic Music Conference, Indiana Black Expo, Turning Point Urban Business Summit & Expo, and Urban Network Power Summit to name a few. Kevyn continues to leverage the combination of his entertainment experience, strong industry relationships, cultural exposure, and integrity to provide quality services and mentoring to others. Kevyn's work ethic and commitment to overachieving can be translated into only one thing and that is, 'Value Added Success'. Previously published works include " Corporate Credit Unleashed: EVERYTHING YOU BETTER KNOW ABOUT CORPORATE CREDIT WHEN YOUR PERSONAL CREDIT SUCKS" With the recent release of "When All Else Fails....Create A New Credit File" and the soon-to-be released autobiography "A Thin Line Between Hollywood Dreams and White Collar Schemes" Kevyn will continue to build on the brand he has worked so hard to establish over the past half a century. Specialties Artist Development, Artist Management, Label Development, Radio/Retail Promotion,Tradeline Enhancements, Paydex Score Enhancements, Corporate Credit, Shelf Corporations, Will/Estate Planning, Credit Privacy Files, Media Development,Marketing/Promotion Strategies, Business Development, Tax Planning, Non Profit and Foundation Development, Offshore Banking Services, and Chexsystem Removal.
